tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vulnerability_reports (
    vulnerability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_name VARCHAR(255),
    severity_level INT,
    affected_system VARCHAR(255),
    remediation_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE remediation_actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_id INT,
    action_type VARCHAR(50),
    action_description TEXT,
    action_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Vulnerabilities (
    vulnerability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_name VARCHAR(255),
    severity_level INT,
    description TEXT,
    remediation_steps TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE VulnerabilityManagement (
    management_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_id INT,
    assigned_to_user VARCHAR(255),
    due_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE VulnerabilityTracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_id INT,
    time_logged TIMESTAMP,
    notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE RemediationHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_id INT,
    remediation_date DATE,
    remediated_by_user VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE vulnerability_scan (
    scan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    scan_date DATE,
    scanner_name VARCHAR(255),
    vulnerability_id INT,
    asset_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE remediation (
    remediation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    remediation_date DATE,
    remediation_description TEXT,
    vulnerability_id INT,
    asset_id INT
);
